branch_point.content:
# ACGS-2 Example 04: End-to-End Governance Workflow - Project Configuration
# Constitutional Hash: cdd01ef066bc6cf2

[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=61.0", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "acgs2-example-04-end-to-end-governance"
version = "1.0.0"
description = "ACGS-2 Example 04: Complete end-to-end AI governance workflow with constitutional policy validation, HITL approvals, and audit logging"
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.11"
license = {text = "Apache-2.0"}
authors = [
    {name = "ACGS Team"}
]
keywords = [
    "acgs",
    "ai-governance",
    "constitutional-ai",
    "policy-evaluation",
    "human-in-the-loop",
    "audit-logging",
    "opa",
    "example"
]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 4 - Beta",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License",
    "Operating System :: OS Independent",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.13",
    "Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules",
    "Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Artificial Intelligence",
    "Typing :: Typed",
]
dependencies = [
    "requests>=2.31.0,<3.0.0",
    "psycopg2-binary>=2.9.9,<3.0.0",
    "pydantic>=2.5.0,<3.0.0",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0,<2.0.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
enhanced = [
    "redis>=5.0.0,<6.0.0",
    "fastapi>=0.104.0,<1.0.0",
    "uvicorn[standard]>=0.24.0,<1.0.0",
]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.4.0,<8.0.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.21.0,<1.0.0",
    "pytest-cov>=4.1.0,<5.0.0",
    "black>=23.0.0,<24.0.0",
    "mypy>=1.7.0,<2.0.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0,<1.0.0",
]
all = [
    "redis>=5.0.0,<6.0.0",
    "fastapi>=0.104.0,<1.0.0",
    "uvicorn[standard]>=0.24.0,<1.0.0",
    "pytest>=7.4.0,<8.0.0",
    "pytest-asyncio>=0.21.0,<1.0.0",
    "pytest-cov>=4.1.0,<5.0.0",
    "black>=23.0.0,<24.0.0",
    "mypy>=1.7.0,<2.0.0",
    "ruff>=0.1.0,<1.0.0",
]

[project.urls]
Homepage = "https://acgs.io"
Documentation = "https://docs.acgs.io/examples/04-end-to-end-governance-workflow"
Repository = "https://github.com/acgs/acgs2"
"Example Directory" = "https://github.com/acgs/acgs2/tree/main/examples/04-end-to-end-governance-workflow"

[tool.setuptools]
packages = ["src"]

[tool.setuptools.package-dir]
src = "src"

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "7.0"
testpaths = ["tests"]
python_files = ["test_*.py", "*_test.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
asyncio_mode = "auto"
addopts = [
    "-v",
    "--strict-markers",
    "--tb=short",
    "-ra",
    "--cov=src",
    "--cov-report=term-missing",
]
markers = [
    "asyncio: mark test as async",
    "slow: marks tests as slow (deselect with '-m \"not slow\"')",
    "integration: marks tests requiring external services (OPA, PostgreSQL)",
    "unit: marks tests as unit tests",
]
filterwarnings = [
    "ignore::DeprecationWarning",
    "ignore::PendingDeprecationWarning",
]

[tool.coverage.run]
source = ["src"]
branch = true
relative_files = true
omit = [
    "tests/*",
    "*/__pycache__/*",
    "*.pyc",
    "venv/*",
    ".venv/*",
    "*/tests/*",
    "conftest.py",
    "**/conftest.py",
]

[tool.coverage.report]
exclude_lines = [
    "pragma: no cover",
    "def __repr__",
    "raise AssertionError",
    "raise NotImplementedError",
    "if __name__ == .__main__.:",
    "if TYPE_CHECKING:",
    "if typing.TYPE_CHECKING:",
]
fail_under = 80
show_missing = true
precision = 2

[tool.coverage.html]
directory = "htmlcov"

[tool.coverage.xml]
output = "coverage.xml"

[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py311"

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = [
    "E",    # pycodestyle errors
    "W",    # pycodestyle warnings
    "F",    # Pyflakes
    "I",    # isort
    "B",    # flake8-bugbear
    "C4",   # flake8-comprehensions
    "UP",   # pyupgrade
    "ARG",  # flake8-unused-arguments
    "SIM",  # flake8-simplify
]
ignore = [
    "E501",   # line too long, handled by formatter
    "B008",   # do not perform function calls in argument defaults
]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["src"]

[tool.ruff.lint.per-file-ignores]
"__init__.py" = ["F401"]
"tests/*" = ["F841", "F401"]
"*/tests/*" = ["F841", "F401"]
"**/test_*.py" = ["F841", "F401"]
"**/*_test.py" = ["F841", "F401"]

[tool.black]
line-length = 100
target-version = ['py311']
exclude = '''
/(
    \.git
  | \.venv
  | venv
  | \.eggs
  | \.tox
  | build
  | dist
)/
'''

[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.11"
strict = true
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_ignores = true
disallow_untyped_defs = true
ignore_missing_imports = true
exclude = ["venv", ".venv", "tests"]
check_untyped_defs = true
disallow_any_generics = false

task_intent.title: 061-create-end-to-end-governance-workflow-examples-wit
task_intent.description: Create comprehensive examples demonstrating complete governance workflows from policy creation through enforcement to audit logging, targeting Enterprise DevOps/MLOps engineers deploying AI systems. The examples will show: defining constitutional policies, enforcing them on agent actions, handling HITL approvals, and auditing decisions.
